content:
Employees of the State Bureau of Investigation of Ukraine completed the investigation into the employee of the Razdelnyansky District Territorial Center for the Acquisition and Social Support of the Odessa region, who, together with the law enforcement officer, promised to help the evidence to avoid the call.

This is stated inmessageDBR.

The indictment is sent to court.

It is established that an employee of the territorial assembly center due to his familiar law enforcement officer suggested a military personnel to help the serviceman in issuing unfitness documents.

"He even provided a" choice ": to make an unfit for marrying a woman with a disability, or a restriction on health," the statement said.

In February 2024, DBR employees detained businessmen while receiving $ 7,000.

The persons who are dismissed from positions, they are accused of obtaining an undue benefit committed by a group of persons by prior conspiracy (under Part 2 of Article 28 of Part 2 of Article 369-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine).

The sanction of the article provides for imprisonment for up to 5 years.

As reported by the Armyinform, DBRsuedThe case against the Zaporizhzhya Exvikocom.
title: The employee of the Tax Code and JV was sent to court for "white tickets" in Odesa region
description: This is stated in the DBR message. The indictment is sent to court. ...
